texts.text: You've just rediscovered your Holomap! You can use it by going through your inventory with the (SHIFT) key or access it directly with the (H) key.
You've just rediscovered your Magic Ball! Try using it on the clones!
You've just stolen Dr. FunFrock's saber!
You've just found Gawley's Horn, an object left for you by your ancestors.
You've just earned the first level of Magic by finding the Tunic left for you by your ancestors. You will be able to store up magic with it.
You've just earned the second level of Magic by finding the Book of Bù.
You've just earned the third level of Magic by finding Sendell's Medallion.
You've just earned the fourth level of Magic by filling up your flask with Clear Water.
You now have the Red Magnetic Card.
With this card you are the fourth member of the Elves club. Anyway, its your own business!
You've just rediscovered your ID card.
You now have the Architect's pass.
You now have the Proto-Pack.
The Kamis have given you a Snowboard.
You have a Meca-Penguin.
You've just replenished some of your gas supply.
You've just stolen a Pirate's Flag.
You've just found a Magic Flute.
The wise man gave you the Space Guitar.
You've just bought a hair dryer.
You've just found the key lost by your ancestor Hégésippe.
You've just found a Bottle of Syrup!
The bottle is now empty.
You have a Ferry Ticket.
You just received a keypad that controls a digital locking system.
You now possess a coffee pot.
M. Lanktir gave you his list.
